$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
An Application Insights component daily data volume cap

___cap.description: Daily data volume cap in GB.

___warningThreshold.description: warning threshold of daily volume cap.

___stopSendNotificationWhenHitThreshold.description: Do not send a notification email when the daily data volume hit the warning threshold.

___stopSendNotificationWhenHitCap.description: Do not send a notification email when the daily data volume cap is met.
